special_fa.p: The unitid comes before the unittitle. The transformation does not allow the unitid to appear in the Container column. The transformation instead re-creates a new table in cell[2]. The unitid is given a cell 25% and the unittitle is given the rest (100 - $x).

The unitid comes before the unittitle. The transformation does not allow the unitid to appear in the Container column. The transformation instead re-creates a new table in cell[2]. The unitid is given a cell 25% and the unittitle is given the rest (100 - $x).
